name: Wasteland Racers HTML5 (Old)
description:
Project no longer supported: Well, the truth is, Wasteland Racers has not been supported for 9 months, but I figured I could do a tiny re-release of it, but now on HTML5 platform! I also provided a link to the source code so anyone can do what they want with the old game. And Thanks Vlambeer for creating nuclear throne, our favorite at clamchamps!

This Fan-Made Nuclear Throne-based game is about literally racing your way to the Nuclear throne. Choose between four characters, run in seven worlds, and overcome over 15 enemies/obstacles. Even though there is a finish line, this game is endless! Loop over the worlds as the difficulty raises as you survive...The Wasteland Race!
